sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Peerreview.css"; function PeerReviewProcessPage() { const [expandedRole, setExpandedRole] = useState(null); const roles = [ { role: "Managing Editor", description: "Triages submissions, assigns editors and reviewers, and oversees timelines." }, { role: "Associate Editor", description: "Manages peer review and synthesizes reviewer reports." }, { role: "Peer Reviewer", description: "Provides independent and expert evaluation of manuscripts." }, { role: "Community Validator Panel", description: "Performs replication and practical relevance checks." }, { role: "Copyeditor & Production", description: "Handles language, formatting, metadata, and compliance." }, { role: "Ethics & Oversight Officer", description: "Manages conflicts, appeals, and ethics investigations." }, ]; const reviewWorkflow = [ { step: 1, title: "Submission", description: "Author submits manuscript via online portal." }, { step: 2, title: "Automated Screening", description: "AI-assisted screening for format, plagiarism, and language." }, { step: 3, title: "Managing Editor Review", description: "Scope and suitability assessment." }, { step: 4, title: "Reviewer Assignment", description: "2‚Äì3 reviewers assigned anonymously." }, { step: 5, title: "Peer Review", description: "Structured evaluation using scoring rubrics." }, { step: 6, title: "Editor Synthesis", description: "Reviews compiled and decision recommended." }, { step: 7, title: "Author Revision", description: "Revisions submitted with response letter." }, { step: 8, title: "Final Acceptance", description: "Manuscript approved for publication." }, { step: 9, title: "Copyediting & QA", description: "Language, citation, and formatting checks." }, { step: 10, title: "Publication", description: "Article published with DOI and metadata." }, ]; return (

Peer Review Process

A hybrid review model combining double-anonymous review, AI screening, and community validation.

{/* ROLES */}

Roles & Responsibilities

{roles.map((r, idx) => (
setExpandedRole(expandedRole === idx ? null : idx)} >

{r.role}

{r.description}

))}
{/* WORKFLOW */}

Submission to Publication

{reviewWorkflow.map((step, idx) => (
{idx < reviewWorkflow.length - 1 &&
}
{step.step}

{step.title}

{step.description}

))}
{/* BEST PRACTICES */}

Best Practices

‚öñÔ∏è

Fairness

Double-anonymous review ensures unbiased evaluation.

‚öôÔ∏è

Efficiency

AI tools reduce turnaround time.

üìä

Consistency

Structured rubrics guide decisions.

üéì

Validation

Community checks ensure real-world relevance.

); } export default PeerReviewProcessPage;
